pages.text: The $(item)Crude Drying Rack$() and $(item)Drying Rack$() can be used to dry or store items.$(p)$(info) Both racks will benefit from being placed near a $(item)Campfire$() and will be at a disadvantage when it is raining.
A $(item)Crude Drying Rack$() can be made by tying some $(item)Sticks$() together with $(item)Plant Fibers$().$(p)$(info) A $(item)Crude Drying Rack$() can also be used to store a single item.
A sturdier, less crude $(item)Drying Rack$() can be made by lashing $(item)Sticks$() together with $(item)Twine$().$(p)$(info) A $(item)Drying Rack$() can be used to store four items.
